General.Name: General Assembly Holdings Ltd
General.Description: General Assembly Holdings Limited engages in the restaurant business in Canada. Its restaurant sells pizzas and ancillary food products. The company was formerly known as Lalani Thompson Holdings Inc. and changed its name to General Assembly Holdings Limited in December 2020. General Assembly Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2017 and is based in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 200-333 Adelaide Street West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5V 2G5
